scripts.clean: rm -rf $TMPDIR/react-* && watchman watch-del-all && npm cache clean
scripts.clean-start: npm run clean && npm run rc-start
scripts.fresh-install: rm -rf $TMPDIR/react-* && watchman watch-del-all && rm -rf ios/build/ModuleCache/* && rm -rf node_modules/ && npm cache clean && npm install
scripts.fresh-start: npm run fresh-install && npm run rc-start
